attributes.action: Follow through with his apparent intention to introduce the AV+ voting system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AV+ ensures that people will retain a link with their local representative while making the process of choosing that representative fairer.  It allows voters to rank MP candidates in order of preference.  If no candidate secures 50% of the vote, the person with the fewest votes is eliminated and their ballots redistributed according to preference.  This process ensures an MP has a broad base of support within their constituency.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
